Posts.Content: i have my first chemo tomorrow and i am up beat about it we are all different  not sure about the hairloss but have had it cut before hand i am assured that wigs are free and chemo nurse should have details or you get a voucher towards cost i also have had lump removed but they also found a gland that was cancerous lymph nodes were clear  dont think cold caps are much good hope you get on ok
Posts.Title: 1st chemo on wed!!!
